#summary V usage

= Introduction =

V language is a simple concatenative language inspired by joy. Currently it
exists in JVM land only.

= Usage =
 * invocation
{{{
   java v/V
      |V|
   |
}}}
 * Simple arithmetic
{{{
   |1 2 +
   =3
}}}

 * Define words using the function '.'
{{{
   |[add +].
   |1 1 add
   =2
   |[check [10 >?] ['is lt 10' println] ['is gt 10' println] ifte].

   |1 check
   =is lt 10
   |100 check
   =is gt 10
}}}
